Issue.summary: Program doesn't stop after unregistering a listener
Issue.description: { console.log('message received'); const data = (event.payload as Buffer).toString('utf8'); expect(data).to.equal('xxxx'); listener.unregister(); } ); listener.unregister(); {code} I expected to end the program after de listener unregister but nothing happens and the program keeps running. am I missing something? shouldn't the program stop?
